verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, I have <S%H5414>made<s%> thee a <S%H430>god<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> shall be thy <S%H5030>prophet<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> all that I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, that he <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of his <S%H776>land<s%>.
And I will <S%H7185>harden<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> my <S%H226>signs<s%> and my <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

But <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto you, that I may <S%H5414>lay<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> mine <S%H6635>armies<s%>, and my <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%>.

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when I stretch <S%H5186>forth<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> them.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, so <S%H6213>did<s%> they.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, when they <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

When <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto you, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H5414>Shew<s%> a <S%H4159>miracle<s%> for you: then thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> thy <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and it shall become a <S%H8577>serpent<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and they <S%H6213>did<s%> so as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> cast <S%H7993>down<s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and it became a <S%H8577>serpent<s%>.

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> also <S%H7121>called<s%> the wise <S%H2450>men<s%> and the <S%H3784>sorcerers<s%>: now the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, they also <S%H6213>did<s%> in like <S%H3651>manner<s%> with their <S%H3858>enchantments<s%>.

For they cast <S%H7993>down<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and they became <S%H8577>serpents<s%>: but <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H4294>rod<s%> swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%> their <S%H4294>rods<s%>.
And he <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, that he <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3515>hardened<s%>, he <S%H3985>refuseth<s%> to let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>.

<S%H3212>Get<s%> thee unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; lo, he goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H4325>water<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H5324>stand<s%> by the <S%H2975>river's<s%> <S%H8193>brink<s%> against he <S%H7125>come<s%>; and the <S%H4294>rod<s%> which was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> me unto thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%>, that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: and, behold, <S%H3541>hitherto<s%> thou wouldest not <S%H8085>hear<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, In this thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: behold, I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> with the <S%H4294>rod<s%> that is in mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H4325>waters<s%> which are in the <S%H2975>river<s%>, and they shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

And the <S%H1710>fish<s%> that is in the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>, and the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H887>stink<s%>; and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3811>lothe<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>Say<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> thy <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, upon their <S%H5104>streams<s%>, upon their <S%H2975>rivers<s%>, and upon their <S%H98>ponds<s%>, and upon all their <S%H4723>pools<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, that they may become <S%H1818>blood<s%>; and that there may be <S%H1818>blood<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, both in vessels of <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and in vessels of <S%H68>stone<s%>. pools: Heb. gathering of their waters

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>; and he lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were in the <S%H2975>river<s%>, in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>; and all the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that were in the <S%H2975>river<s%> were <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

And the <S%H1710>fish<s%> that was in the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>; and the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H887>stank<s%>, and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>; and there was <S%H1818>blood<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so with their <S%H3909>enchantments<s%>: and <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened<s%>, neither did he <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into his <S%H1004>house<s%>, neither did he <S%H7896>set<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H2063>this<s%> also.

And all the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H2658>digged<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H2975>river<s%> for <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>; for they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>.
And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> the <S%H2975>river<s%>.
